description.description: Applied symmetry operations based on given spacegroup
Applied symmetry operations based on given spacegroup

comments: The cell is tetragonal, beta-tin-type (3rd. ref, McMahon et al.), with a=5.667, c= 3.054, above 56 Pa Sr V with a=b=6.958, c=3.959, Z=10.808
Deviation from I41/amd pretended by an impurity
